content: heel flap knit to end 84 94 sts total size small only round 2 knit to first marker sm ssk knit to 2 sts before the next round k5 m1l 72sts marker k2tog round 3 knit size large only work rnds 2 and 3 until 60 72 stitches remain next round k6 m1l 84 sts foot leg continue in stockinette stitch until the sock measures 1¼ size small only 1¾ / 3 4 5 cm from total desired foot length work chart 1 - small bigger on the inside the chart is re- peated 2 times across each row toe next round k1 k2tog k6 k2tog k1 60sts work chart 2 - small time traveller the chart is repeated 6 round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before the marker k2tog k1 sm times across each row two times total work chart 2 three times through round 2 knit keep working rnds 1 and 2 until 32 32 stitches remain slip size large only the first half of the stitches onto one needle slip the remain- work chart 1 - large bigger on the inside the chart is re- ing stitches onto the second needle graft the toe together peated 2 times across each row next round k2 k2tog k6 k2tog k2 72sts finishing work chart 2 - large time traveller the chart is repeated 6 times across each row weave in all the ends and block make the second sock the work chart 2 three times through same as the first heel flap turn work the next 30 36 sts will be worked back and forth to become the heel flap row 1 ws sl 1 p 29 35 row 2 rs sl 1 k1 until all stitches have been worked work row 1 and 2 until a total of 36 row have been worked ending on a rs turn heel row 1 sl 1 p15 18 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl 1 k3 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap then p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap then ssk k1 turn work row 3 and 4 until 16 20 sts remain ending on a rs row do not turn work on the last row the remainder of the sock will be worked on the rs note for the size small the last two row will end with the decrease stitch and no additional stitch afterwards http //bear-ears com/ © audry nicklin 2011-2014 for personal use only all rights reserved v03 26 15 police box sox -
